title: Microsoft Word 2003 - Portable Version
description:
Microsoft Word 2003 - Portable Version



Description:

	 
	This version of Microsoft Word 2003 was made especially for USB flash drives as it does not require any installation. Put this on your USB flash drive or portable hard disk and use it on just about any Windows computer (Internet cafe, school, library etc. ).

	Everything you would normally find on an "installed" version of Word 2003 is included in this portable version.



Note:

	For those who are new to portable applications, this can also be used from a local hard drive on most Windows PCs.



Instructions:


	1. Unpack the .7z file using WinRAR (or 7zip).

	2. You should get a folder called "Word 2003 Portable".

	3. If you plan on using this on a USB storage device, place the "Word 2003 Portable" folder on your USB device. 

	4. Inside the "Word 2003 Portable" folder, double click on the "Microsoft Office Word 2003.exe" file to start using the application.
